price: Neither the heaven nor earth wept for them, nor were they given any respite.
arabic: فَمَا بَكَتۡ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ وَٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَمَا كَانُواْ مُنظَرِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
